===================
LICENSE INFORMATION
===================

This file contains the license information for the files located in the
resource folder.

captcha.ttf
===========
the captcha font is called Dustismo Sans and is licensed under the GPL.
You'll find the font here: http://www.dustismo.com/site/fonts.html

This is used by the `pocoo.utils.captcha` module to create captcha images.
we use this font because it is easy to read and only 51KB small.
